00061     function _findRedirect($headers)
00062     {
00063         foreach ($headers as $line) {
00064             if (strpos($line, "Location: ") === 0) {
00065                 $parts = explode(" ", $line, 2);
00066                 return $parts[1];
00067             }
00068         }
00069         return null;
00070     }
